discrete.description: Displays a numeric value label upon pressing the thumb which allows the user to select an exact value.

withTickMarks.description: Displays tick marks which represent predetermind values to which the user can move the slider. NOTE: the slider must be discrete to display tick marks, and to function correctly, there must be an integer amount of total steps within the range. i.e. (max - min) % step === 0

valueStart.description: Current value of the start thumb handle.

valueEnd.description: Current value of the end thumb handle.

min.description: Value representing the minimum allowed value.

max.description: Value representing the maximum allowed value.
